Articles.Content:
Version: 32-bit 0.25

Problem: CTD on Loading Screen, particularly when loading BoulderCo texture "kerbin1.png"

Reproduction Steps:

Install BoulderCo stuff, run 32-bit version, it will load slowly and then crash when trying to load kerbin1.png.

I have tried with 64-bit KSP too and it loads everything fine but then it crashes whenever I go to the launch pad (probably a separate issue).

I can give a list of mods installed but it's a long one.

Log:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DzoBrOBSW3J1E4cUwf_H4njvayAiZOkTlZziX1zlmZI/edit?usp=sharing

I will probably try installing another beautification mod. Maybe that will help.

Could not allocate memory: System out of memory!

That means your KSP has hit its memory limit, and you need to reduce your memory usage through one of the usual ways (Active Texture Manager, force OpenGL mode, etc.) or simply reduce the number of mods.

That means your KSP has hit its memory limit, and you need to reduce your memory usage through one of the usual ways (Active Texture Manager, force OpenGL mode, etc.) or simply reduce the number of mods.

Thanks, I both forced OpenGL AND installed the Active Texture Manager. However, now my beautification mod's clouds have disappeared although other parts of the mod are still active.

Should I just find some lower-res clouds?

EDIT: Tried lower res clouds, still didn't work.

Edited December 10, 2014 by Spiritwalker

Thanks, I both forced OpenGL AND installed the Active Texture Manager. However, now my beautification mod's clouds have disappeared although other parts of the mod are still active.

Should I just find some lower-res clouds?

EDIT: Tried lower res clouds, still didn't work.

I'd look at your part mods and spend some time removing parts you don't use or need. Also the cloud mods use up ALOT of RAM even with lower res clouds mostly because they need so much rendering space. If you use B9 that's a lot but it is ok if and only if you use Texture management.

I've found a good rule is 2 full parts mods such as NovaPunch KW B9 LLL or KW and beautification works at low res and half size textures turned on in the options menu. However any more such as smaller parts mods like MKRS will kill your game.

If you're set on using the beautification mod then only use 1 large part pack and select parts from others and you should be ok

Hope this helps
RE clouds not showing up, what EVE version and pack are you using?

RE clouds not showing up, what EVE version and pack are you using?

The clouds not showing up are likely to do with the OpenGL setting he forced on
